actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to authorize production of records by the Senate Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations.

summary.text: Authorizes the Chairman and Ranking Minority Member of the Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations of the Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs to provide to the Inspector General of the Department of Education and to the Department of Justice records of the Subcommittee's investigation of fraud allegations and other wrongdoing in Federal student loan programs.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize production of records by the Senate Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations.
